Undergraduate Programme Offered
===============================

The Faculty of Mechanical Engineering (FME) offers 3 accredited BEng programmes. All the undergraduate BEng programmes are Mechanical Engineering-based. Students spend the first two years taking the basic mechanical engineering courses and spend the last two years doing their specialization courses.
